text: Rance Allen (November 19, 1948 â€“ October 31, 2020) was an American Bishop, Minister, and gospel singer. He was the founder and leader of the Rance Allen Group. He was the senior pastor of the New Bethel Church Of God In Christ in Toledo, Ohio. In November 2011, Allen became Bishop in the Church of God in Christ, for the Michigan Northwestern Harvest Jurisdiction. Allen was born in Monroe, Michigan. Allen died on October 31, 2020 from surgery-related problems, aged 71. ==References== Category:1948 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:American gospel singers Category:Singers from Michigan
title: Rance Allen
